chat.msg: Where do i have to go?
I'm not sure what you mean
I'm not sure what you mean
I'm not sure what you mean
Where do i have to go?
But i have not reached the leopard yet
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the leopard
Where do i have to go?
great do you see the treasure?
It's pretty far, i did not pass the crocodile yet
go down until you get to the crocodile and see the treasure
Awsome! i have reached the crocodile
I didn't pass the big rock yet
Which direction should i go now?
It's pretty far, i have not reached the big rock yet
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the big rock
I have not been at the elephant yet
Sure, i have reached the elephant
It's pretty far, i did not pass the 2 gray rocks yet
Sure, i have reached the 2 gray rocks
I'm not sure what you mean
Ok, i did it, i'm next to the snake
